mapper.sql: SELECT BOARD_NO boardNo , BOARD_CATEGORY boardCategory , MEMBER_NAME boardWriter , BOARD_TITLE boardTitle , CREATE_DATE createDate , COUNT
mapper.select: FROM KH_BOARD JOIN KH_MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = MEMBER_ID) ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE KH_BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{ boardNo }
mapper.select: , BOARD_CONTENT boardContent FROM KH_BOARD JOIN KH_MEMBER ON (MEMBER_ID = BOARD_WRITER) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{ boardNo }
